languages.text: {n}Прохладная ладонь Кассии чуть касается лба, и водоворот красок врывается в ваше сознание. Чувства и эмоции меняются под натиском чужой воли — знакомое ощущение, однако в этот раз все происходит иначе. Мягко, безболезненно, даже... приятно? Усталость покидает плечи поспешно, за ней утихает боль в изнуренных мышцах, и с каждым вздохом грудная клетка все больше наполняется чувством уверенности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Прохладная ладонь Кассии чуть касается лба, и водоворот красок врывается в ваше сознание. Чувства и эмоции меняются под натиском чужой воли — знакомое ощущение, однако в этот раз все происходит иначе. Мягко, безболезненно, даже... приятно? Усталось покидает плечи поспешно, за ней утихает боль в изнуренных мышцах, и с каждым вздохом грудная клетка все больше наполняется чувством уверенности.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Your feelings and emotions change under the onslaught of a will that is not yours. The sensation is familiar, but this time, the process is different. Soft. Painless. Perhaps even... pleasurable? Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прохладная ладонь Кассии чуть касается лба, и водоворот красок врывается в ваше сознание. Усталость покидает плечи поспешно, за ней утихает боль в изнуренных мышцах, и с каждым вздохом грудная клетка все больше наполняется чувством уверенности.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅冰凉的手掌轻轻触摸着你的额头，一股色彩的漩涡涌入了你的意识。某个并不属于你的意志冲击着你，你的感觉与情绪也发生了变化。这种感觉你已经很熟悉了，但这一次的过程却截然不同。它很柔和，没有任何刺痛，甚至令你……感到愉悦？你肩膀处的疲劳快速消退。随后，你疲惫已久的肌肉也不再疼痛，就连每一次呼吸，都让你的胸口越发充盈着自信的感觉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Your feelings and emotions change under the onslaught of a will that is not yours. The sensation is familiar, but this time, the process is different. Soft. Painless. Perhaps even... pleasurable? Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅冰凉的手掌轻轻触摸着你的额头，一股色彩的漩涡涌入了你的意识。某个并不属于你的意志冲击着你，你的感觉与情绪也发生了变化。这种感觉你已经很熟悉了，但这一次的过程却截然不同。它很柔和，没有任何刺痛，甚至令你……感到愉悦？你肩膀处的疲劳快速消退。随后，你疲惫已久的肌肉也不再疼痛，就连每一次呼吸，都让你的胸口越发充盈着自信的感觉。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La fría palma de Cassia toca ligeramente tu frente y un torbellino de colores inunda tu consciencia. Tus sentimientos y emociones cambian por una voluntad que no es la tuya. La sensación te resulta familiar, pero esta vez es diferente. Suave. Indolora. Hasta... ¿placentera? La fatiga abandona tus hombros, seguida del dolor de tus músculos. Cada vez que respiras, parece que tus pulmones se llenan de confianza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Your feelings and emotions change under the onslaught of a will that is not yours. The sensation is familiar, but this time, the process is different. Soft. Painless. Perhaps even... pleasurable? Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}

La sensación te resulta familiar, pero esta vez es diferente. Suave. Indolora. Hasta... ¿placentera? La fatiga abandona tus hombros, seguida del dolor de tus músculos. Cada vez que respiras, parece que tus pulmones se llenan de confianza.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアの冷たい手のひらがあなたの額に軽く触れ、色彩の渦があなたの意識に押し寄せてくる。自分ではない意志の猛攻撃を受け、あなたの感情と情動が変化する。その感覚は馴染んだものではあるが、今回はその過程が違った。柔らかく。痛みもない。もしかしたら…快感さえ帯びているような気すらした。肩から疲労が急速に抜けていく。次に、疲れ切った筋肉の痛みが和らぎ、呼吸をするたびに胸が自信で満たされていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Your feelings and emotions change under the onslaught of a will that is not yours. The sensation is familiar, but this time, the process is different. Soft. Painless. Perhaps even... pleasurable? Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの冷たい手のひらがあなたの額に軽く触れ、色彩の渦があなたの意識に押し寄せてくる。自分ではない意志の猛攻撃を受け、あなたの感情と情動が変化する。その感覚は馴染んだものではあるが、今回はその過程が違った。柔らかく。痛みもない。もしかしたら…快感さえ帯びているような気すらした。肩から疲労が急速に抜けていく。次に、疲れ切った筋肉の痛みが和らぎ、呼吸をするたびに胸が自信で満たされていった。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassias kühle Handfläche berührt sanft deine Stirn, und ein Mahlstrom aus Farben strömt in dein Bewusstsein. Deine Gefühle und Emotionen verändern sich unter dem Ansturm eines Willens, der nicht dein eigener ist. Das Gefühl ist vertraut, doch dieses Mal ist der Prozess anders. Sanft. Schmerzlos. Vielleicht sogar ... angenehm? Die Erschöpfung wird schnell aus deinen Schultern gesaugt. Dann lässt der Schmerz in deinen erschöpften Muskeln nach, und jeder Atemzug füllt deine Brust mit einem immer stärkeren Gefühl des Selbstbewusstseins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Your feelings and emotions change under the onslaught of a will that is not yours. The sensation is familiar, but this time, the process is different. Soft. Painless. Perhaps even... pleasurable? Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}

Deine Gefühle und Emotionen verändern sich unter dem Ansturm eines Willens, der nicht dein eigener ist. Das Gefühl ist vertraut, doch dieses Mal ist der Prozess anders. Sanft. Schmerzlos. Vielleicht sogar ... angenehm? Die Erschöpfung wird schnell aus deinen Schultern gesaugt. Dann lässt der Schmerz in deinen erschöpften Muskeln nach, und jeder Atemzug füllt deine Brust mit einem immer stärkeren Gefühl des Selbstbewusstseins.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Au moment où Cassia pose délicatement sa paume sur votre front, un maelstrom de couleurs envahit votre conscience. Vos émotions changent sous l'assaut d'une volonté qui n'est pas la vôtre. Cette sensation vous est familière, mais cette fois, le processus n'est pas le même. Il est doux, indolore. Vous iriez même jusqu'à dire... plaisant ? Très rapidement, vous sentez la fatigue quitter vos épaules. La douleur qui assaillait vos muscles se dissipe et chaque inspiration vous emplit d'une assurance grandissante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Your feelings and emotions change under the onslaught of a will that is not yours. The sensation is familiar, but this time, the process is different. Soft. Painless. Perhaps even... pleasurable? Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia soğuk avucuyla hafifçe alnına dokunduğu sırada bilincin bir renk seline kapılıyor. Hislerin ve duyguların, kendininkinden başka bir iradenin hücumu karşısında değişikliğe uğruyor. Verdiği his benzer gelse de bu kez farklı bir süreç yaşanıyor. Hafif. Acısız. Hatta sanki... Zevk veriyor. Omuzlarındaki yorgunluk, sen farkına varmadan geçiyor. Ardından bitkin kaslarındaki acı azalıyor. Aldığın her nefesle göğsündeki öz güven hissi artıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's cool palm touches your forehead lightly, and a maelstrom of colours comes flooding into your consciousness. Fatigue drains out of your shoulders fast. Next, the pain in your exhausted muscles subsides, and each breath you take fills your chest with an increasing sense of confidence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia soğuk avucuyla hafifçe alnına dokunurken, bilincin bir renk seline kapılıyor. Kendininkinden başka bir iradenin hücumu karşısında, hislerin ve duyguların değişikliğe uğruyor. Verdiği his benzer gelse de bu kez farklı bir süreçten geçiyor. Hafif. Acısız. Hatta sanki... Zevk veriyor. Farkına bile varmadan omuzlarındaki yorgunluk geçiyor. Ardından bitkin kaslarındaki acı azalıyor. Aldığın her nefesle göğsündeki öz güven hissi artıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
